00031 #include <obd.h>
00032 #include "osc_internal.h"

00034 static inline struct osc_quota_info *osc_oqi_alloc(u32 id)
00035 {
00036         struct osc_quota_info *oqi;
00037 
00038         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR(oqi, osc_quota_kmem);
00039         if (oqi != NULL)
00040                 oqi->oqi_id = id;
00041 
00042         return oqi;
00043 }
00044 
00045 int osc_quota_chkdq(struct client_obd *cli, const unsigned int qid[])
00046 {
00047         int type;
00048         ENTRY;
00049 
00050         for (type = 0; type < MAXQUOTAS; type++) {
00051                 struct osc_quota_info *oqi;
00052 
00053                 oqi = cfs_hash_lookup(cli->cl_quota_hash[type], &qid[type]);
00054                 if (oqi) {
00055                         /* do not try to access oqi here, it could have been
00056                          * freed by osc_quota_setdq() */
00057 
00058                         /* the slot is busy, the user is about to run out of
00059                          * quota space on this OST */
00060                         CDEBUG(D_QUOTA, "chkdq found noquota for %s %d\n",
00061                                type == USRQUOTA ? "user" : "grout", qid[type]);
00062                         RETURN(NO_QUOTA);
00063                 }
00064         }
00065 
00066         RETURN(QUOTA_OK);
00067 }
00068 
00069 #define MD_QUOTA_FLAG(type) ((type == USRQUOTA) ? OBD_MD_FLUSRQUOTA \
00070                                                 : OBD_MD_FLGRPQUOTA)
00071 #define FL_QUOTA_FLAG(type) ((type == USRQUOTA) ? OBD_FL_NO_USRQUOTA \
00072                                                 : OBD_FL_NO_GRPQUOTA)
00073 
00074 int osc_quota_setdq(struct client_obd *cli, const unsigned int qid[],
00075                     u64 valid, u32 flags)
00076 {
00077         int type;
00078         int rc = 0;
00079         ENTRY;
00080 
00081         if ((valid & (OBD_MD_FLUSRQUOTA | OBD_MD_FLGRPQUOTA)) == 0)
00082                 RETURN(0);
00083 
00084         for (type = 0; type < MAXQUOTAS; type++) {
00085                 struct osc_quota_info *oqi;
00086 
00087                 if ((valid & MD_QUOTA_FLAG(type)) == 0)
00088                         continue;
00089 
00090                 /* lookup the ID in the per-type hash table */
00091                 oqi = cfs_hash_lookup(cli->cl_quota_hash[type], &qid[type]);
00092                 if ((flags & FL_QUOTA_FLAG(type)) != 0) {
00093                         /* This ID is getting close to its quota limit, let's
00094                          * switch to sync I/O */
00095                         if (oqi != NULL)
00096                                 continue;
00097 
00098                         oqi = osc_oqi_alloc(qid[type]);
00099                         if (oqi == NULL) {
00100                                 rc = -ENOMEM;
00101                                 break;
00102                         }
00103 
00104                         rc = cfs_hash_add_unique(cli->cl_quota_hash[type],
00105                                                  &qid[type], &oqi->oqi_hash);
00106                         /* race with others? */
00107                         if (rc == -EALREADY) {
00108                                 rc = 0;
00109                                 OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(oqi, osc_quota_kmem);
00110                         }
00111 
00112                         CDEBUG(D_QUOTA, "%s: setdq to insert for %s %d (%d)\n",
00113                                cli_name(cli),
00114                                type == USRQUOTA ? "user" : "group",
00115                                qid[type], rc);
00116                 } else {
00117                         /* This ID is now off the hook, let's remove it from
00118                          * the hash table */
00119                         if (oqi == NULL)
00120                                 continue;
00121 
00122                         oqi = cfs_hash_del_key(cli->cl_quota_hash[type],
00123                                                &qid[type]);
00124                         if (oqi)
00125                                 OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(oqi, osc_quota_kmem);
00126 
00127                         CDEBUG(D_QUOTA, "%s: setdq to remove for %s %d (%p)\n",
00128                                cli_name(cli),
00129                                type == USRQUOTA ? "user" : "group",
00130                                qid[type], oqi);
00131                 }
00132         }
00133 
00134         RETURN(rc);
00135 }
00136 
00137 /*
00138  * Hash operations for uid/gid <-> osc_quota_info
00139  */
00140 static unsigned
00141 oqi_hashfn(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key, unsigned mask)
00142 {
00143         return cfs_hash_u32_hash(*((__u32*)key), mask);
00144 }
00145 
00146 static int
00147 oqi_keycmp(const void *key, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00148 {
00149         struct osc_quota_info *oqi;
00150         u32 uid;
00151 
00152         LASSERT(key != NULL);
00153         uid = *((u32 *)key);
00154         oqi = hlist_entry(hnode, struct osc_quota_info, oqi_hash);
00155 
00156         return uid == oqi->oqi_id;
00157 }
00158 
00159 static void *
00160 oqi_key(struct hlist_node *hnode)
00161 {
00162         struct osc_quota_info *oqi;
00163         oqi = hlist_entry(hnode, struct osc_quota_info, oqi_hash);
00164         return &oqi->oqi_id;
00165 }
00166 
00167 static void *
00168 oqi_object(struct hlist_node *hnode)
00169 {
00170         return hlist_entry(hnode, struct osc_quota_info, oqi_hash);
00171 }
00172 
00173 static void
00174 oqi_get(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00175 {
00176 }
00177 
00178 static void
00179 oqi_put_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00180 {
00181 }
00182 
00183 static void
00184 oqi_exit(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00185 {
00186         struct osc_quota_info *oqi;
00187 
00188         oqi = hlist_entry(hnode, struct osc_quota_info, oqi_hash);
00189 
00190         OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(oqi, osc_quota_kmem);
00191 }
00192 
00193 #define HASH_QUOTA_BKT_BITS 5
00194 #define HASH_QUOTA_CUR_BITS 5
00195 #define HASH_QUOTA_MAX_BITS 15
00196 
00197 static struct cfs_hash_ops quota_hash_ops = {
00198         .hs_hash        = oqi_hashfn,
00199         .hs_keycmp      = oqi_keycmp,
00200         .hs_key         = oqi_key,
00201         .hs_object      = oqi_object,
00202         .hs_get         = oqi_get,
00203         .hs_put_locked  = oqi_put_locked,
00204         .hs_exit        = oqi_exit,
00205 };
00206 
00207 int osc_quota_setup(struct obd_device *obd)
00208 {
00209         struct client_obd *cli = &obd->u.cli;
00210         int i, type;
00211         ENTRY;
00212 
00213         for (type = 0; type < MAXQUOTAS; type++) {
00214                 cli->cl_quota_hash[type] = cfs_hash_create("QUOTA_HASH",
00215                                                            HASH_QUOTA_CUR_BITS,
00216                                                            HASH_QUOTA_MAX_BITS,
00217                                                            HASH_QUOTA_BKT_BITS,
00218                                                            0,
00219                                                            CFS_HASH_MIN_THETA,
00220                                                            CFS_HASH_MAX_THETA,
00221                                                            &quota_hash_ops,
00222                                                            CFS_HASH_DEFAULT);
00223                 if (cli->cl_quota_hash[type] == NULL)
00224                         break;
00225         }
00226 
00227         if (type == MAXQUOTAS)
00228                 RETURN(0);
00229 
00230         for (i = 0; i < type; i++)
00231                 cfs_hash_putref(cli->cl_quota_hash[i]);
00232 
00233         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00234 }
00235 
00236 int osc_quota_cleanup(struct obd_device *obd)
00237 {
00238         struct client_obd     *cli = &obd->u.cli;
00239         int type;
00240         ENTRY;
00241 
00242         for (type = 0; type < MAXQUOTAS; type++)
00243                 cfs_hash_putref(cli->cl_quota_hash[type]);
00244 
00245         RETURN(0);
00246 }
00247 
00248 int osc_quotactl(struct obd_device *unused, struct obd_export *exp,
00249                  struct obd_quotactl *oqctl)
00250 {
00251         struct ptlrpc_request *req;
00252         struct obd_quotactl   *oqc;
00253         int                    rc;
00254         ENTRY;
00255 
00256         req = ptlrpc_request_alloc_pack(class_exp2cliimp(exp),
00257                                         &RQF_OST_QUOTACTL, LUSTRE_OST_VERSION,
00258                                         OST_QUOTACTL);
00259         if (req == NULL)
00260                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00261 
00262         oqc = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_OBD_QUOTACTL);
00263         *oqc = *oqctl;
00264 
00265         ptlrpc_request_set_replen(req);
00266         ptlrpc_at_set_req_timeout(req);
00267         req->rq_no_resend = 1;
00268 
00269         rc = ptlrpc_queue_wait(req);
00270         if (rc)
00271                 CERROR("ptlrpc_queue_wait failed, rc: %d\n", rc);
00272 
00273         if (req->rq_repmsg &&
00274             (oqc = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_OBD_QUOTACTL))) {
00275                 *oqctl = *oqc;
00276         } else if (!rc) {
00277                 CERROR ("Can't unpack obd_quotactl\n");
00278                 rc = -EPROTO;
00279         }
00280         ptlrpc_req_finished(req);
00281 
00282         RETURN(rc);
00283 }
